name: Dad Haunted Forest Mystery
description:
Get ready for the most horror papa haunted mansion game with the most horrible gameplay sound effects. You are all alone in the haunted forest and plan for the horror escape. Be careful about the scary horror papa as he is approaching you and is searching for you. You are surrounded by the evil creepy dad. You are now part of the haunted escape story. Download it now and be ready to face the haunted horror ghost town story.

There is no escape from the horror escape forest now as you need to go to certain points for the survival. Rescue other innocent family members from the trap of the scary horror papa. There is no one in the ghost haunted forest. You are the only survivor in the haunted forest. So, get ready to rescue the other people from the horror papa trap. Don’t get afraid of the haunted graveyard. This is the most
mysterious and puzzled scary papa horror forest because you are not able to find any escape. You are
trying to get out of this horror neighbor papa house but you are failed to escape.

Download the creepiest scream papa horror forest escape story. Accomplish the mystery that is hidden
in the haunted horror forest. Become the part of this horror story. Don’t be distracted from the horrible ghost background sound. You need to escape from the fear horror forest after reaching to the certain points. We have introduced the creepiest scream fear house escape story simulator. Get ready to be the part of the extreme mystery game and there is no other that can make you feel the goose bumps in your
whole body. Feel the thrill as well as the excitement in inside you that will push you to complete this game regardless of your scariness. You need to accomplish the survival mission as well as to finish the
scary papa.

FEATURES
• Frightful evil spirits effects
• Addictive and haunted 3D haunted forest environment
• Realistic scary sound effects
• Challenging gameplay with interactive controls
• Get to the points to rescue the innocent people
• Reveal the hidden mystery
